price: Sema: Hakika mimi namwomba Mola wangu Mlezi, wala simshirikishi Yeye na yeyote.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا
footnotes: Sema: Hakika mimi namuabudu Mola wangu Mlezi peke yake, wala simshirikishi na yeyote katika ibada.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
